data.name: Panzer War : Definitive Edition (Cry of War)
data.detailed_description:
Panzer War: Definitive Edition is a TPS tank shooting game. It includes module-based damage mechanic and hp-based damage mechanic. You can select different damage mechanic in the game option. The game uses the new rendering pipelines. The module-based damage is similar to War Thunder. It calculates how shell damage internal modules and gives the x-ray replay. The hp-based damage is similar to World of Tanks.

The game do not contain tech-tree. You do not need to unlock any vehicle. You can play all the tanks in the game for free. It includes more than 20 tanks from WW2 to Modern Wars. And more tanks are coming in the recent updates. Also, the game supports workshop. You can download hundreds of mod tanks from workshop for free.

The game modes contain 7V7,Skirmish(Respawn),Historical Mode and Play Field. More modes are coming in the recent updates.

FAQ Frequent-Ask-Question
1. Where is Cry of War?
Cry of War is replaced by PanzerWar:DE. The module-based damage mechanics have been improved and added to PanzerWar:DE. Also, the WW1 tanks will be added to PanzerWar:DE soon.

2. How can I install mods？
Open the workshop，https://steamcommunity.com/app/798840/workshop/ Select your favorite tanks and click subscribe. The steam will automatically install these tanks to the game.

3. Why tanks in the workshop is only available for hp-based game mode?
These mods are converting to module-based. And they will be available soon.

4. How can I play mobile version？
Mobile version web site: https://game.waroftanks.cn/de It is being tested in CN region now.

When you purchase this game, you will also get the classic version of Panzer War for free.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1019010/Panzer_War/

data.short_description: Panzer War: Definitive Edition is a TPS tank shooting game. It includes module-based damage mechanic and hp-based damage mechanic. You can select different damage mechanic in the game option. The game uses the new rendering pipelines.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64Bit
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: i7-2600K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
